questions.question: Do you think there will be a time where there's tens of thousands of delivery drones that fill the sky?
How do you go from idea to deploying vehicles like you are in a bunch of places, including New York?
If you do it at that scale, like today, for instance, Uber, if you talk to a driver, right?
How do we make drones see many more frames a second, you know, to enable aggressive flight?
But let me ask, reminiscent of the DARPA days, predictions, you think anybody will finish?
So how many in the space of all possible courses are, would humans win and would machines win?
Whether it's simple equation, experiment, a demo, simulation, piece of software, or just what just gives you pause?
And if you have several variables that you're kind of jointly trying to determine, how do you determine that?
